title: Mirai Nikki Redial: Data Ikou
alternative_title: The Future Diary: Redial, 未来日記リダイヤル
description: The Second is dead and the Gasai Yuno in the third world finally gets to live a happy life with her loving parents and friends from school. But there is still an empty place in her heart — it seems she has forgotten a person really close to her but simply cannot regain her memories...
